entry.title: Ukraine's Zelensky Is Facing a Turning Point as He Heads to Washington
entry.content: The Ukrainian president’s visit reflects his country’s existential urgency of maintaining the flow of weapons from the U.S., which has been the country’s primary arms supplier.

entry.title: The Forgotten Man of mRNA Research
entry.content: Jason Schrum’s work helped lay the foundation for Moderna’s mRNA Covid vaccine, but he hasn’t won any prizes or royalties and left the company after disagreements.
